Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP from France for a few months. Once I successfully reached the furthest bodies of Kerbol without any explosion or crash, I felt sad and thought I finished the game. Now I discover the tremendous KSP community and the stuning addons they make, expanding and hardening the gameplay to new horizons. I realize I just scrached the surface, and I am glad to feel like a newbie amongst you.

Greetings!
Hello Ucender, and welcome to the KSP community forum! Enjoy your (hopefully long) stay here!
Yeah with mods you can try so many things. Oh and welcome to the forums!

Ah, but you can never finish KSP, did you not know? It keeps you forever...

Welcome aboard!

Thank you for the welcomes.

@Maximus : You are probably right. At least I know it can keep you awake all night, several nights in a row. And if you fall asleep, KSP comes in your dreams...
